document.full_text: a u.s. consumer group alleged on tuesday that researchers with ties to eli lilly and co withheld important information from a medical journal in their study of an imaging drug for alzheimer's disease.
document.title: public citizen: key data left out of alzheimer's study
lines_and_colors: a u.s. consumer group alleged on tuesday that researchers with ties to eli lilly and co withheld important information from a medical journal in their study of an imaging drug for alzheimer's disease.
